name: Panda Quest - Ep. 1 Dragon Invasion
description:
Bouncing Panda, Hungry Dragons! Jump and Shoot your way to the safety of your pagoda in the clouds. But watch out for Dragons that will stop you dead in your tracks!

The deadly Chinese Dragons have invaded your bamboo forest. The Triad wants your turf, and they mean to get it over your dead body. Luckily you've got your arsenal of guns and jumping skills to fight them off.

How long can you survive against the Dragons in the first episode of Panda Quest...

★ FEATURES ★

AWESOME PHYSICS JUMPING ACTION
Platforming fun! Bounce on the bamboo leaves to escape the Dragons and find your way to the pagoda. Tilt your device to guide the panda through a jungle labyrinth filled with danger.

EVER CHANGING JUNGLE MAZES
The bamboo forest is dynamically created for each level. Not only does it get longer, but it constantly varies during your adventure.

FRENETIC SHOOTING MAYHEM
Not only do you have to get to the safety of your pagoda, but you also need to shoot the Dragons in your way. Use the guns at your disposal to deal with your enemies.

MULTIPLE WEAPON UPGRADES
Collect coins to buy new and more powerful weapons like the Double Barrel shotgun.

TONS OF POWER UPS & LOOT
Shooting and jumping isn't enough to survive this quest! You'll have to grab Coins, Ammo, and other powerups along your path to safety.

THE DRAGONS GET TOUGHER & TOUGHER
The adventure gets progressively harder with each level. The Dragons get tougher, bite you for more damage, and the maze gets longer. How many levels can you survive?

HD iPAD & RETINA GRAPHICS
Specifically created with HD graphics throughout the game. It's a visual treat to play this game on the iPad and Retina devices.

Game music by Matt McLellan
